releaseMessage: You can listen to "¿Qué vamos a hacer?" now!

info.title: ¿Qué vamos a hacer?
info.subtitle: Already available
info.text: You can already listen in every platform '¿Qué vamos a hacer?', the fourth single from our future LP. A boy and a girl meet at a '90s party, they like each other, and when the night ends, expectations cross their path... find out how the story ends!

pressKit.title: Press kit
pressKit.text: Here you can download our press kit

20241004.title: Primera Fila Fest
20241004.text: On Friday, October 4th, we'll be performing at the Primera Fila Fest at Fun House. You can now buy early tickets, don't miss it out!

stayTuned: At this time we haven't any gig scheduled soon. Stay tuned!

presave.title: Ley de la atracción
presave.subtitle: Premieres on September 27
presave.text: On September 27th, we’re releasing Ley de la atracción. What happens when someone disarms you with just one look? This song captures that moment when everything changes, where the magnetism between two people is so strong that there’s no turning back, and you don’t even know why... find out if this law is more than just a simple theory!

contest.fib: Vote for us to play at FIB!

fiestasArganzuela.title: Fiestas de Arganzuela 2024
fiestasArganzuela.subtitle: Full show on Youtube
fiestasArganzuela.text: You can already watch our latest full live show at Fiestas de La Melonera in Arganzuela in our Youtube channel. If you want to hear our new forthcoming releases in a live format... Don't miss it out!

aboutUs.title: About us
aboutUs.info:
We are a Madrid-based indie pop rock band.

We love art, cinema, great soundtracks, series, pop culture... All of this influences our songwriting.

Our music reflects who we are, and we try to make you experience new sensations with us or connect by feeling something that resonates with you.

We enjoy what we do and want you to be a part of it.
